document_data.name: Carrackus
document_data.mainbody: '''Carrackus''' was a male [[scrag]] and a pirate on the [[Sword Coast]] under the command of [[Pinochet]].
document_data.History:
Carrackus was present in [[1356 DR]] when the ''[[Sea Sprite]]'', sailed by Captain [[Deudermont]] and the [[Companions of the Hall]], defeated Pinochet's fleet, but Carrackus managed to escape.<ref>

Carrackus later became captain of his own pirate ship. However, in [[1364 DR]], he was pursued by the ''Sea Sprite'' and defeated by [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] and [[Guenhwyvar]]. He was torn to pieces and the ''Sea Sprite''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s crew fished his remains out of the sea so they could be burned and permanently destroyed
